content.p:
ยง 363. Declaration of objects. Medical assistance for needy persons
is hereby declared to be a matter of public concern and a necessity in
promoting the public health and welfare and for promoting the state's
goal of making available to everyone, regardless of race, age, national
origin or economic standing, uniform, high-quality medical care. In
furtherance of such goal, a comprehensive program of medical assistance
for needy persons is hereby established to operate in a manner which
will assure a uniform high standard of medical assistance throughout the
state. In carrying out this program every effort shall be made to
promote maximum public awareness of the availability of, and procedure
for obtaining, such assistance, and to facilitate the application for,
and the provision of such medical assistance.
